actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice

official_title: A bill to amend title 11, United States Code, to clarify certain provisions relating to time periods for timeshare plans, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends Federal bankruptcy law to revise the definition of a timeshare plan to encompass the right to use a timeshare interest for any period of time (but less than a full year) during any given year (thus granting such interests certain rights in bankruptcy).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 11, United States Code, to clarify certain provisions relating to time periods for timeshare plans, and for other purposes.
